text: U tyahi ho jasale timila'i matobata pheri virya (nutpha) bata pheri raktapindabata srsti garyo, ani usale timila'i e'uta baccako rupama nikaldacha, ani (timila'i badha'umcha) taki timi aphno paripakvatala'i prapta gara, pheri vrd'dhavasthama puga. Yadyapi timiharumadhye kohi yasabhanda pahila pani marihalchan, (usale timila'i chodi dincha) taki timi nirdharita ayusam'ma puga ra yo yasakarana gardacha ki timile bujhihala
